title: Gabriel Knight Sins of the father HD (Patch 1) (GOG)
description:
Hey guys, here the latest patch for Gabriel Knight. Hope you guys enjoy and please help seed.


---------------------


Items of note: 

- Changed wording for Continue (this option is only for automatic saves) 

- Changed spoiler line for drummer outside police station after learning of rada network 

- Various autosave points fixed with more autosaves added to aid in checkpoint play 
- Mime puzzle fixed when talking to cop with mime in tow (mime puzzle overall still being refined) 

- Narrator subtitles now show if narrator is muted 

- Fixed music ducking when narrator is muted 

- Fixed misc incorrect audio 


- Fixed inventory refresh when checking the manila envelope, the white envelope, or wallet 

- You can now press I to pull up your inventory 

- Bigger save/load button to fit different languages 

- Restored some missing shadows in various scenes 

- Fast forwarding no longer looks horrible 

And good news! 
We've listened to fans of the special content wanting to browse everything. 
You can now look at all bonus content from the main menu after beating the game! 
Just look for Schattenjager Archives! 

Patch 2: 

- Fixed Brokeback Mountain issue (new menu option shoved Quit off screen) 

Patch 3: 

- Fixed Benny Hill skipping
